LanguageData.VME_GrotesqueOrgy.stages.0.label: uncool great shag
LanguageData.VME_GrotesqueOrgy.stages.0.description: that great shag was like totally uncool man, absolute bummer.
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardOrgy.stages.0.label: awkward great shag
LanguageData.VME_AwkwardOrgy.stages.0.description: that great shag was like totally awkward man, nobody knew what to do, the love was free but nobody was taking.
LanguageData.VME_SexyOrgy.stages.0.label: sexy great shag
LanguageData.VME_SexyOrgy.stages.0.description: that great shag was awesome, the love was free and everyone was giving and taking in turn.
LanguageData.VME_ExhilaratingOrgy.stages.0.label: mind blowing great shag
LanguageData.VME_ExhilaratingOrgy.stages.0.descriptio: that great shag was like totally awesome man, everyone was shagworthy and boy did we, the afterglow will last days.
LanguageData.VME_GotSomeLovin.stages.0.description: There's nothing like a tumble in the back of a van to lift the mood.
